titles.title: Recognizing Associated Builders and Contractors Florida East Coast Chapter and the many vital contributions merit shop commercial, industrial, and infrastructure construction contractors make to the quality of life of the people of Florida.

Recognizing Associated Builders and Contractors Florida East Coast Chapter and the many vital contributions merit shop commercial, industrial, and infrastructure construction contractors make to the quality of life of the people of Florida.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Accountability.

bill.summary: This resolution recognizes the Associated Builders and Contractors Florida East Coast Chapter, a trade association representing the merit shop (generally nonunion) construction industry.
